title: Previewing 'True Detective' Season 3 | The Watch (Ep. 320)
description:
The first two episodes of 'True Detective' Season 3 premiere this Sunday (1:11) and they are more reminiscent of Season 1 than Season 2 (8:56). Also, we talk about what made the show so popular when it first premiered (17:21).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Jason Concepcion and Miles Surrey
Read Miles Surrey’s piece on Chad Velcoro here.
Read Chris Ryan's 'True Detective' Syllabus here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
